mapper.select: select id, subject_dn subjectDn, start_date startDate, end_date endDate, issuer, subject, ou_type ouType from cert where subject=#{id} or type = 0
select id, file from cert where id = #{id}
select id from cert where id = #{id} and subject = #{subject}
select id, file, subject_dn subjectDn, ou_type ouType from cert where subject_dn = #{subjectDn}

select id, file, subject_dn subjectDn, ou_type ouType, type from cert where
(ou_type = #{ouType} and type=1 ) or type=0
select max(serial_number) from cert where type = #{type}

mapper.select: select c.file, c.subject, kp.private_key from cert c inner join keypair kp on c.key_id = kp.id where c.type = 0
select c.file, c.subject, kp.private_key from cert c inner join keypair kp on c.key_id = kp.id where c.type = 1 and c.ou_type = #{groupName}

select id from cert where type = 1 and ou_type = #{ouType}
